last_episode_to_air.name: Icon
last_episode_to_air.overview: Marilyn shows her mature talent as an actress and wins a triumphant victory over Twentieth Century Fox shortly before her untimely death.

name: Reframed: Marilyn Monroe
overview: Revisit the extraordinary story of a girl who sprang from nowhere to become the most famous woman in the world. Narrated by Golden Globe-winning actress Jessica Chastain and featuring a star-studded cast of female voices, this series re-examines Monroe’s story to uncover themes of feminism, sexuality and power that continue to drive the cultural conversation today.
tagline: The face you know, the story you don't.

episodes.name: Contender
episodes.overview: A young Norma Jeane, while showing talent and audacity, turns her back on her difficult childhood and puts herself on the radar in Hollywood as ‘Marilyn Monroe’.

episodes.name: Siren
episodes.overview: Marilyn’s defiance about posing nude catapults her to stardom.

episodes.name: Rebel
episodes.overview: Determined to become a serious actress, Marilyn departs from Twentieth Century Fox to start her own production company.

episodes.name: Icon
episodes.overview: Marilyn shows her mature talent as an actress and wins a triumphant victory over Twentieth Century Fox shortly before her untimely death.
